## ChildRelation interface

Represents a one-to-many relationship for TModel\[TProp\] in TState

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ChildRelation<TState, TModel extends StateModels<TState>, TChildProp extends ValidModelChildProperties<TState, TModel>> extends StateRelation<TState> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [StateRelation](./model-core.staterelation.md)<!-- -->&lt;TState&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cascadeDelete?](./model-core.childrelation.cascadedelete.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true if children should be deleted when parents are. |
